text: Hey Boss Lei, do you have a minute to chat about the new features I'm working on for Elysion?
I have implemented a tiered pricing system for in-app purchases
Thank you, Boss Lei. I've taken your feedback into consideration and I've been working hard to improve ElysonLand
Boss Lei, I understand the importance of quantifiable evidence. I have been closely monitoring the player feedback and engagement metrics since implementing the changes
Thank you, Boss Lei, for your time and consideration.
Pack up and prepare to leave
